content.description: Each accountant at a large accounting firm was classified according to accountant level (junior or senior) and method of transportation to work (walk, bus, drive alone, or carpool). The responses of the <math alttext="320" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>320</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> accountants at the firm are summarized in the table.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
